name: dunp
description: dunp is an Italian communication agency based in Rome, founded in 2009. They work with entrepreneurs, startups, SMEs, large international players, and institutions. The agency offers tailored digital projects with measurable, realistic, and timely objectives.
team: Professionals with over 10 years of experience including graphic designers, social media managers, and journalists focused on creative and effective digital presence.

portfolio.services: Editorial consulting and publishing for financial reports
Website, landing page, and social media management
E-commerce platform, e-learning, CRM, and advertising
Multichannel management of the Ideas project

notes: dunp emphasizes collaboration with clients, creativity, and building digital presence with measurable goals. They have a strong portfolio with notable clients and offer a wide range of digital marketing and communication services.
